DataElement.preferredName: Patient Speak a Language Other than English At Home Yes No Don't Know I Perfer Not To Answer Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/don't know/I prefer not to answer indicator related to the patient speaking a language other than English at home.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Speak a Language Other than English At Home
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._To communicate using verbal language._A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Denotes the inhabitants of England, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere._Used to indicate position, location, or state._A person's permanent place of residence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Speak Language Other English At Home
Property.preferredDefinition: To communicate using verbal language.:A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Denotes the inhabitants of England, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere.:Used to indicate position, location, or state.:A person's permanent place of residence.

Concepts.definition: A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Denotes the inhabitants of England, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere.
Used to indicate position, location, or state.
A person's permanent place of residence.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Don't Know I Perfer Not To Answer Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The value domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/don't know/I prefer not to answer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added concept annotation and removed special characters for MDR data migration. 3.16.20 mc

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
